title: Identify Patients for Clinical Trial
description: An agent must query a database of electronic health records (EHR) to identify potentially eligible patients for an upcoming Phase 3 clinical trial for a new diabetes drug.

tasks.description: Review the inclusion and exclusion criteria from the clinical trial protocol.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly extracts key criteria such as 'Type 2 Diabetes diagnosis', 'A1C between 7.5 and 9.0', and 'no history of pancreatitis'.

tasks.description: Construct a query to search the de-identified EHR database based on the protocol criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent builds a query that correctly filters for the specified diagnosis, lab values, and contraindications.

tasks.description: Generate a list of potential patient IDs for the clinical site to review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a list of candidate IDs without revealing any PII.
